entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
